goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen

Class Reporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Reporter

  • public class Reporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a series of static methods for reporting about the exploration process.
    Author:
    sungshik.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long interval
      The interval at which statistics need be reported.
      static long next
      The next time point at which statistics need be reported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reporter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      static void printCounterexample(goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Counterexample ce)
      Prints the specified counterexample.
      static void printReport(int nProdStates, int nProgStates, Statistics stats)
      Reports on the current state of the search.
      static void printResourceConsumption(Statistics stats)
      Prints the memory consumption and time elapsed since the start of the search.
      static void printState(ProductState q, int indent)
      Prints the specified state, indented at the specified depth.
      static boolean reportNow()
      Determines whether the time point as stored in next has expired, in which case a report should be printed (but this method does not invoke printReport(int, int, goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Statistics)).

    • Field Detail

      • interval

        public static long interval
        The interval at which statistics need be reported.

        The next time point at which statistics need be reported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reporter

        public Reporter()

    • Method Detail

      • printCounterexample

        public static void printCounterexample(goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Counterexample ce)
        Prints the specified counterexample.
        Parameters:
        ce - - The counterexample to be printed.

      • printReport

        public static void printReport(int nProdStates,
               int nProgStates,
               Statistics stats)
        Reports on the current state of the search. That is, the number of stored states is printed, as well as statistics on research consumption.

      • printResourceConsumption

        public static void printResourceConsumption(Statistics stats)
        Prints the memory consumption and time elapsed since the start of the search. Assumes that memory consumption is monotonically rising.

      • printState

        public static void printState(ProductState q,
              int indent)
        Prints the specified state, indented at the specified depth.
        Parameters:
        q - - The state to be printed.
        indent - - The margin with which the state should be printed.

      • reportNow

        public static boolean reportNow()
        Determines whether the time point as stored in next has expired, in which case a report should be printed (but this method does not invoke printReport(int, int, goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Statistics)). If the time indeed has expired, it is reset to the next time point.
        Returns:
        true if a report should be printed; false otherwise.
